__e: He came to see me tonight to make nice and then threatened in that way he does everything.
He threatened to tell you if I didn't agree to see him again.
He threatened me to kill my family if I spoke.
We've dreamed a dream, my dear, but now it's over.
I was at this restaurant having dinner with a friend, and this prick next to me says that I'm too loud and threatens to call the manager.
And she threatened to go public with the affair.
She pour that vial into my wine. She threatened my life if I failed to give it to you.
